articles.author: Lynn Butler
articles.title: Conrad wants Proteas to play 'aggressive cricket' with World Cup qualification in doubt
articles.description: No nonsense Shukri Conrad was candid and is hoping that the Proteas play aggressive cricket as they look to make a stance in three-match ODI series against England.
articles.content:
• New Proteas coach Shukri Conrad wants his side to play aggressive cricket in the three-match ODI series against England.
  • It'll be Conrad's first assignment as he stands in for white-b… [+3292 chars]

articles.author: Paul Kennedy
articles.title: Sachin Tendulkar's connection with Sir Donald Bradman began with a neighbour's letter from Australia's cricketing great
articles.description: Indian cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar reveals he received an early insight into the character of Sir Donald Bradman thanks to a neighbour who shared a precious reply from the Australian cricket legend to his fan mail.
articles.content:
"When were you first aware of Sir Donald Bradman?" I ask.
"It has to be at home," Sachin Tendulkar says. "I must have been around five years old."
I'm interviewing the Indian cricket great for the … [+5794 chars]

articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
